thread.title: In stunning shift, Trump White House says spread of Israel settlements 'may not be helpful' to peace
thread.title_full: In stunning shift, Trump White House says spread of Israel settlements 'may not be helpful' to peace

author: malterwitty
title: In stunning shift, Trump White House says spread of Israel settlements 'may not be helpful' to peace
text: show ad In stunning shift, Trump White House says spread of Israel settlements 'may not be helpful' to peace A surprise statement issued by the White House Thursday evening said while settlements aren't an impediment to peace, new settlements and expansion 'may not be helpful' in achieving peace Trump hopes to achieve peace 'throughout the Middle East' A senior advisor urged 'all parties to refrain from taking unilateral actions that could undermine our ability to make progress, including settlement announcements' Israel recently announced the construction of 5,500 new settlements Trump is to meet soon with Israel's prime minister Benjamin Netanyahu The Obama administration routinely used to pressure Israel on settlement activity, which it viewed as counterproductive Published: 00:29 GMT, 3 February 2017 | Updated: 16:57 GMT, 3 February 2017 136 shares
